name: LD44 - Bet Your Life
description:
A mysterious stranger, a mysterious game.

How To Play:

The dealer will draw a card, choose how much to bet, and then choose whether the next card drawn will be higher or lower.

Aces are the lowest value, Kings are the highest.

You lose on an incorrect guess, and on a draw.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 44, the theme was "Your life is currency/
